verses.roman:
'mukunda sarasvatī' nāma sannyāsī mahā-jane
eka bahirvāsa teṅho dila sanātane

synonyms: mukunda sarasvatī—Mukunda Sarasvatī; nāma—named; sannyāsī—a sannyāsī; mahā-jane—a great personality; eka—one; bahirvāsa—outward covering; teṅho—he; dila—gave; sanātane—to Sanātana Gosvāmī.
translation: Previously, a great sannyāsī named Mukunda Sarasvatī had given Sanātana Gosvāmī an outer garment.
